description: A vulnerability in ReadA version 1.1.0.2 and previous allows an authorized user with access to a privileged account on a BD Kiestra system (Kiestra TLA, Kiestra WCA, and InoqulA+ specimen processor) to issue SQL commands, which may result in loss or corruption of data.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Kiestra TLA, Kiestra WCA, and InoqulA+ specimen processor using ReadA Overview version 1.1.0.2 and previous.
